org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss
Class DeployableUnit

java.lang.Object
  org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss.DeployableUnit

public class DeployableUnit
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a SLEE Deployable Unit, represented by a collection of Deployable Components. Contains all the DU dependencies, install/uninstall actions needed for the DU and post-install and pre-uninstall actions.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexandre Mendon√ßa
